content: this pattern is available for free at https //www windingroadcrochet com/crochet-baby-bow-headband/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms pattern level easy this pattern uses the chain yarn over slip_stitch materials needed size 4 yarn yarn 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle and scissors this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2022 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell redistribute or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be no refunds after purchase
